item.title: Surviving Grad School in the Pandemic
item.description: A lot of this advice is generalizable to graduate school advice, even outside the context of trying to do a Ph.D. in the middle of a pandemic. Iâ€™ve found that things that used to be helpful in (1) maintaining my mental health, and (2) being able to be productive have now become crucial to hitting a baseline level of sanity and getting literally anything done. There are a couple caveats that should be highlighted: (1) I have been lucky in the sense that my Ph.
